task.voice: 我们从0到1搭建了自己的具身智能软件平台，这就像是给机器人打造了一个超级聪明的大脑，让它能够实现语音交互、决策规划和运动控制的一体化方案。 这就像是我们的机器人能够听懂我们的话，理解我们的需求，然后做出最合适的动作。 同时，我们的大模型感知及决策技术也是我们自己研发的！这意味着我们的机器人能够像人类一样感知世界，做出明智的决策。 你想再深入了解哪部分，让【美拉】给你再好好介绍一下！
task.voice_en: We've built our own embodied intelligence software platform from scratch, which is like giving the robot a super smart brain, enabling it to achieve an integrated solution for voice interaction, decision-making planning, and motion control. It's like our robots can understand what we say, grasp our needs, and then make the most suitable moves. Our large-scale perception and decision-making technology is also developed by us! This means our robots can perceive the world like humans and make wise decisions. Which part would you like to delve deeper into? Let [Mera] give you a more detailed introduction!
